title: SmartSalonBot
body: Developed a salon manager web application utilizing React and styled it with Tailwind CSS. Translated the Figma design into a functional web application.

title: Prism SFA
body: Contributed to the development of PrismSFA, a Sales Force Management App with over 1000+ active users. Integrated various APIs, conducted testing, and incorporated the Google Maps Geolocation API as a third-party service.

title: CodeAspire.com
body: Enhanced the official website of CodeAspire Consultancy by creating and refining custom UI components to meet specific requirements.

title: Portfolio Website
body: Designed and developed a minimalist portfolio website to showcase projects and skills. Utilized Next.js and the Aceternity UI library for implementation.

title: Blog Website
body: Developed a Backend as a Service (BaaS) blog website to exhibit projects and skills. Employed React, Tailwind CSS, and utilized Appwrite as a Backend Service.

title: UI Design for SmartSalonBot
body: Executed a UI/UX design project for a salon web application, emphasizing intuitive navigation and visually appealing interfaces. Crafted using Figma.
